DOC.brief_summary: This study examine Raloxifene versus Clomiphene induce ovulation woman polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Raloxifene Induce Ovulation Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Clomiphene citrate ( CC ) major pharmaceutical treatment anovulation polycystic ovary syndrome , use 40 year . Despite vast experience use drug , pregnancy rate associate use low recent large study Australia regard birth defect suggest CC may associate birth defect . Alternatives CC limit . Another selective estrogen receptor modulator , Raloxifene ( RAL ) long half life exhibit CC , recently show equivalent CC term ability induce ovulation PCOS woman . In addition , prior study demonstrate potential benefit marker uterine receptivity cell line model block estrogen activity . Beyond , study examine whether Raloxifene effective oral agent treatment woman desire pregnancy , investigator ' hypothesis Raloxifene work well CC well establishment maintenance pregnancy CC
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 18 36 2 . BMI > 19 & < 40 3 . PCOS diagnosis evidence : Oligo and/or anovulation ( < 6 cycle per year ) one following : Clinical and/or biochemical sign hyperandrogenism Polycystic ovary exclusion aetiology ( congenital adrenal hyperplasia , androgensecreting tumor , Cushing 's syndrome ) 1 . Use ovulation induction agent within past 6 month 2 . Positive pregnancy test take study medication 3 . History current thromboembolic disorder 4 . Coronary artery disease heart attack stroke 5 . Tobacco use history within past 6 month 6 . History pelvic inflammatory disease tubal factor infertility 7 . Congenital adrenal hyperplasia 8 . Diabetes Mellitus Any subject Metformin must `` wash '' 30 day prior screen 9 . History endometriosis 10 . Known male factor infertility
